item.description:
Topic: Things You Can Do To Combat Global Warming



Time: 4:00 p.m. Meditation, Sharing and Discussion & Social Hour



Where: Our regular meeting place (see below)



6:00 p.m. Dinner @ a local restaurant on Main Street



Discussion Facilitator: Ms. J. Bush


Call us at: 860-759-4975

Visit our Main Web site for more information

http://buddhistfaith....

E-mail us at

buddha.gaia@hotmail.com


A MESSAGE FOR MEETUP MEMBERS. Some on Meetup.Com have NEVER attended one of our meetings. This is your opportunity to participate, meet others with similiar interests, discuss environmental and social issues etc. Why not? Please come!! The door is open.
item.how_to_find_us: Free parking on Hamil Ct. In a condo & look for number 19.
item.why: make a positive difference in global warming, and other environmental and social issues. Also, this is a warm and friendly group. You'll like everybody. Lots of smiling and compassionate folks.
item.name: Things You Can Do To Combat Global Warming
